name: The Ghost and the Darkness
description: Sir Robert Beaumont is behind schedule on a railroad in Africa. Enlisting noted engineerJohn Henry Pattersonto right the ship, Beaumont expects results. Everything seems great until the crew discovers the mutilated corpse of the project's foreman, seemingly killed by a lion. After several more attacks, Patterson calls in famed hunter Charles Remington, who has finally met his match in the bloodthirsty lions.—Jwelch5742
